amendment.description: Amendment sought to require GAO to conduct a study and report to Congress regarding the consequences of limiting, through regulation, commissions, fees, or other costs incurred by customers in the acquisition of financial products.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 7 printed in H. Rept. 106-214 to strike section 241, subtitle D, of title II and require the GAO conduct a study regarding the consequences of limiting, throught reulation, commissions, fees, or other costs incurred by customers in the acquisition of financial products.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cook amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 114 - 313 (Roll no. 270).
